attributes.action: bring in a Zero Tolerence Policy on drink driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Year after year many people die from either being under the influence of drink while driving or by someone who was. Many people have different limits to what they can drink and are still fit to drive. If we brought this to a Zero Tolerence Policy then you will definately know whether you are fit to drive or not.
